PostgreSQL
insert into "user_sensor_roles" (uts, user_id, sensor_role_id, status, type) values (#{uts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update "user_sensor_roles" set uts = #{uts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_role_id = #{sensorRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, uts, user_id, sensor_role_id, status, type from "user_sensor_roles"
